en.title: Create a new module
en.subtitle: What kind of module do you need?

bundles.title: Blank module
bundles.description: Empty module to start from nothing.

templates.title: Basic template
templates.description: Choose one of the base templates of the module types so that you can guide yourself and advance in a simple way

options.title: Module with node service
options.description: Page with service and WebSocket connection implemented

options.title: Página
options.description: A module that can be accessed via a URL

options.title: Widget
options.description: Exports a web component that allows working under micro-frontends or Islands architectures.

options.title: Layout
options.description: Permite definir la estructura general de varias páginas y compartir elementos en común de la aplicación

options.title: Code
options.description: Multipurpose. You can be a logic module or with a graphical interface.

options.title: Bridge
options.description: Modules that allow to integrate backend logic with the client through websockets automatically

options.title: Typescript
options.description: Ideal for implementing any type of logic that only requires typescript code and no other processors.

options.title: Start
options.description: They allow you to add logic that must be executed at the beginning of the application.
